text: Ulla Pia (17 February 1945 - 22 August 2020) was a Danish pop jazz singer. She was born in Copenhagen. Pia was best known internationally for her participation in the 1966 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Stop - mens legen er go'" ("Stop, While the Going's Good"). Pia died in Copenhagen on 22 August 2020 from cancer, aged 75.Stod bag utallige ørehængere: Sangerinden Ulla Pia er død ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Denmark Category:Danish singers Category:Pop singers Category:Jazz singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Copenhagen
